text: aur usane pravesh kiya nagar mein usake vaasiyon kee achetana ke samay aur usamen do vyaktiyon ko ladate hue paaya, ye usake giroh se tha aur doosara usake shatru mein[1] se. to pukaara usane, jo usake giroh se tha, usake virudhd, jo usake shatru mein se tha. jisapar moosa ne use ghoonsa maara aur vah mar gaya. moosa ne kahaah ye shaitaanee karm hai. vaastav mein, vah shatru hai khula, kupath karane vaala
